meanings.sent1: The teacher reinvolves the students in the discussion after a break.
meanings.sent2: She reinvolves herself in the project after taking a short break.
meanings.sent3: The magician reinvolves the disappearing rabbit back into the hat.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for painting reinvolves her in the world of art.
meanings.sent5: The detective's keen observation skills reinvolves him in the unsolved case.

meanings.definition: To bring back into a situation or process.
meanings.sent1: The coach reinvolves the player in the game after a brief rest.
meanings.sent2: He reinvolves himself in the project to help his team succeed.
meanings.sent3: The chef reinvolves the forgotten ingredient back into the recipe.
meanings.sent4: Her determination reinvolves her in the competitive world of sports.
meanings.sent5: The music's rhythm reinvolves the audience in the dance performance.

meanings.sent1: The revised edition reinvolves additional information for clarity.
meanings.sent2: The updated report reinvolves the latest findings on the topic.
meanings.sent3: The recipe reinvolves the secret ingredient for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her speech reinvolves key points to emphasize the main message.
meanings.sent5: The expanded version reinvolves more details to provide a comprehensive view.
